name: 王甡
objective:
本課程主要目的在於讓學生透過熟悉財金時事所使用之英文專業名詞、市場術語，以及行業慣有之英文論述結構等提升財金領域之專業英文閱讀能力；此外，本課程亦將著重於訓練學生之英譯能力。
The major purpose of this course is to promote learners’ reading ability by training them to understand terminologies, jargons and description structure of writings in finance news and events. In addition, this course also aims to train the learners’ ability of translating English into Chinese.

materials:
教材：
本課程主要針對國際金融市場與國際企業等相關外文平面媒體報導及國際組織發布之報告為素材，講授金融與財務專業領域的專業用語、撰文結構、報導觀點及評論分析等進行討論，所選用的平面媒體將以經濟學人、新聞周刊為主要選取對象；國際組織則主要美國證管會、歐洲央行、國際證監會組織及新加坡金融管理局等為選取對象。
Course materials:
This course collects the clipped news and reports from financial magazines, including the Economist and Global Finance, and international organizations, including U.S. Security Exchange Commission, European Central Bank, the International Organization of Securities Commissions and Monetary Authority of Singapore.
consultation: 本課程將對修習課程學生設置社群媒體群組，以便利對學生公告資訊與處理學生提問 This course will set up a group in some social media to announce important information and deal with the questions from students.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
